title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 3x CryptoImperator 2019 Satoshi To The World, silver 1oz#30 "1KrjRdGR" #32 "1F3TAVU4"#73 "1NEiGDns" MS68 PL*LOT 1 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-lot multi-coin auctions.LOT 2: 1x CryptoImperator 2018 To The Moon/Rocket, silver 1/2oz MS68 PL#73 "1BeFGCHS"LOT 3: 1x CryptoImperator 2018 World Crypto Con/Pumpkin, silver 1/2oz"1N9zPN6E"STARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0120BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: JULY 13th, 2022, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOTIf within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made PER LOT, 5 minutes will be added to the that lot from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference
